1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Dharr narrated that :AlIah's Messenger said: "Pure clean earth is a purifier for the Muslim; even if he did not find water for ten years. Then if he finds water, then let him use it (for purification) on his skin. For, that is better

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّيَمُّمِ لِلْجُنُبِ إِذَا لَمْ يَجِدِ الْمَاءَ
chapter.eng-name: [What has Been Related] About Tayammum For The Junub Person When He Does Not Find Water
